client_description_Summary_Note:
Marchand Richard Lefebvre and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Paris. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Marchand Richard Lefebvre is a 21 year old and comes from France.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Marchand Richard Lefebvre is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: Marchand finished secondary school at Lycée Montaigne in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Marchand Richard Lefebvre is a 21 year old and comes from France.
Marchand Richard Lefebvre did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1910000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Investment Banker, in 2019.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is excited to help Marchand navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
